#summary Publications describing and using Biodiverse (or its ancestors)
#labels Featured
#sidebar TOC

==Primary citation==
To cite Biodiverse or acknowledge its use, cite this publication as follows, substituting the version of the application that you used for "Version 0.14".
  *  Laffan, S.W., Lubarsky, E. & Rosauer, D.F. (2010) Biodiverse, a tool for the spatial analysis of biological and related diversity.  [http://dx.doi.org/10.1111/j.1600-0587.2010.06237.x Ecography. Vol 33, 643-647 (version 0.14)].

  (An alternate link for general access is http://handle.unsw.edu.au/1959.4/45539 ).
